name: Adela Promotion
overview:
JSC Design and Creative Media Adela activities with the aim of providing units for the overall solution of brand development: from market research, advertising strategy, design items in brand identity system … to the implementation of communication programs … Adela wishes to build each unit a separate brand identity specific to each industry sector to bring the values â€‹â€‹that the unit gives its customers, while also building and implementing brand strategies for each unit for each specific target.

Adela is always ready to become your reliable partners during the development of enterprises, organizations and individuals nationwide.

The main areas of activity of Adela include:

                       - Creative Design
                       - Building and developing brand
                       - Website Design and Development
                       - Media Room
                       - Printing on all materials
                       - Design and construction Furniture - Architecture

In the context of market economy, tough competition today, the brand is always a problem that all businesses are focused and need a reliable partner to guide and give the optimal solution for Marketing and PR plan. Team of consultants, design and engineering experience, has conducted many projects large and small scale will satisfy your requirements.

COMPANY DESIGN AND COMMUNICATION CREATIVE Adela Address: 21/124, Hoang Ngan Street, Trung Hoa, Cau Giay, Hanoi Phone: (04) 8587 6245 - 8587 6246-3558 3382 Fax: (04) 3558 3382 Website: http://www.adela.vn Email: contact@adela.vn
